title.rendered: Resistance Bands Set Workout Bands with 5 Stackable Exercise Bands

content.rendered:
Brand Odoland
Material Natural Rubber
Colour Color
Sport Exercise and Fitness, Strength Training, Fitness
Included components User Manual, Carrying, Ankle Strap

About this item

  • 💪 All in One Set, consists of 1 training guide, 5 bands with varying strength, 4 loop bands, 2 handles, 1 door anchor and 2 foot straps.
  • 💪 Upgraded Premium Quality: extra robust resistance bands and connectors, reinforced safety fixtures and seams, professional door anchor and solid stainless steel carabiner hooks and rings, never has training felt so good, helping to raise your resistance training to another level altogether when compared to products.
  • 💪 Multiple Training Choice: yellow, 10lb (4.6kg); red, 20lb(9.1kg); blue, 30lb(13.7 kg); green, 40lb(18.2 kg); black, 50lb(22.7 kg); with a total resistance weight of 68.3 kg. You can adjust the intensity of the bands according to your personal goals. Perfect for everyone, whether beginner or expert man or woman.
  • 💪 Portable Gym Set: Odoland resistance bands can apply to different types exercise. Good for toning your arms, shoulders, chest, glutes, legs etc. Also comes with convenient travel pouch! You can also take your bands to Gym, Office.
  • 💪 Perfect Exercise Bands Set – Odoland resistance bands can help you build muscle, burns fat, increases endurance, and improves flexibility. You can get the same level of fitness at home using your body. Use these resistance bands to perform rows, pulls, raises, and fly workout sets to exercise your arms, back, hips, legs, chest, and abdominal region.
